worldwar2questions.question: Which event is generally considered to be the first belligerent act of World War II?
Which two countries were the first to declare war on Germany?
worldwar2questions.answer4: D) The United States and the USSR

worldwar2questions.question: Against which country did the Soviet Union instigate an armed conflict in late 1939?
What were the first two western European countries that Germany invaded?
Which best describes Germany’s standard invasion strategy at the beginning of World War II?
worldwar2questions.answer1: A) Attack with a combination of speed and overwhelming force
worldwar2questions.answer2: B) Intimidate the enemy by first amassing a large force along the enemy’s border
worldwar2questions.answer3: C) Begin with acts of sabotage behind enemy lines
worldwar2questions.answer4: D) Draw out battles for as long as possible to wear the enemy out
worldwar2questions.correct: A) Attack with a combination of speed and overwhelming force

worldwar2questions.question: What major mistake did the Allies make in preparing to defend against Germany’s attack on France?
worldwar2questions.answer1: A) They failed to anticipate that the attack would take place
worldwar2questions.answer2: B) They expected an attack by ground forces rather than a naval assault
worldwar2questions.answer3: C) They misinterpreted where the main invasion would take place
worldwar2questions.answer4: D) They failed to set up minefields along the border with Germany
worldwar2questions.correct: C) They misinterpreted where the main invasion would take place

worldwar2questions.question: What happened at Dunkirk in May 1940?
worldwar2questions.answer1: A) British forces retreated across the English Channel
worldwar2questions.answer2: B) The French army lost a major battle
worldwar2questions.answer4: D) German forces were defeated in a large naval battle
worldwar2questions.correct: A) British forces retreated across the English Channel

worldwar2questions.question: Where was the French surrender to Germany signed?
Why did the British Royal Navy attack French warships at Mers-el-Kebir?
worldwar2questions.answer1: A) The French crews had sworn allegiance to Germany
worldwar2questions.answer2: B) France was at war with Britain
worldwar2questions.answer3: C) The French crews refused to surrender their ships when the British requested
worldwar2questions.answer4: D) They were manned by Germans
worldwar2questions.correct: C) The French crews refused to surrender their ships when the British requested

worldwar2questions.question: What was Germany’s initial strategy for conquering Britain?
worldwar2questions.answer1: A) First establish air superiority, then send in ground forces
worldwar2questions.answer2: B) First destroy the British navy, then send in ground forces
worldwar2questions.answer3: C) First send in ground forces, then attack the country with aircraft
worldwar2questions.answer4: D) Immobilize London with poison gas attacks
worldwar2questions.correct: A) First establish air superiority, then send in ground forces
